title: Lookin' For
lyrics:
Bop, bop along, girl 
Ooh, ooh 
Bop, bop along, girl 
Oh, oh 
Bop, bop along, girl 
Yeah, yeah 



Tell me are you looking for love? 

'Cause I ain't got no fast car, I ain't got no diamond, no 

If you're looking for love 

Maybe I could help you 

I could be the one to 

Tell me, are you looking for love? 

'Cause I ain't got no fast car, I ain't got no diamond, no 

If you're looking for love 

Maybe I could help you 

I could be the one to 

Tell me, are you looking for-- 



In a plane flying high, feeling lonely 

On the road tryna make something of me 

On my way, on my way 

Oh yeah 

And I told you that I'd be back Sunday 

I let you down once again like I always 

On my way, on my way 



I got a picture of you in my right hand 

And I'm tryna make it back for the weekend 

No, I cannot give you love, oh yeah 

But I could give you something else so 



Tell me are you looking for love? 

'Cause I ain't got no fast car, I ain't got no diamond, no 

If you're looking for love 

Maybe I could help you 

I could be the one to 

Tell me, are you looking for love? 

'Cause I ain't got no fast car, I ain't got no diamond, no

If you're looking for love 

Maybe I could help you 

I could be the one to 

Tell me, are you looking for-- 



Baby, don't break it, don't think it 

Don't lose it, let's fall in love 

A lot I can give you 

I want you to have it like all the time 

Slow-ow-ow, ayy, oh, just slow-ow-ow 

Ayy, everythin' on, let go 

Mama, you're away in Venezuela 

And where I come from, babe 

Girls like you, we call them bae 

The sunlight, can't wait until the moonlight 

Girl, you gotta let me know, yeah, yeah 



I've been looking, looking, looking, looking 

For your loving, loving, loving, baby 

I've been looking, looking, looking for your love 

For your love, babe 



I got a picture of you in my right hand 

And I'm tryna make it back for the weekend 

No, I cannot give you love, oh yeah 

But I could give you something else so 



Tell me are you looking for love? 

'Cause I ain't got no fast car, I ain't got no diamond, no 

If you're looking for love 

Maybe I could help you 

I could be the one to 

Tell me, are you looking for love? 

'Cause I ain't got no fast car, I ain't got no diamond, no 

If you're looking for love 

Maybe I could help you 

I could be the one to 

Tell me, are you looking for love?
